maple: b:= proc(n, k, s, t, l) option remember;
min(s, j), max(t, j), j)), j=max(1, t-k+1)..s+k-1)))
mathematica: b[n_, k_, s_, t_, l_] := b[n, k, s, t, l] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum [If[j == l, 0, b[n-j, k, Min[s, j], Max[t, j], j]], {j, Max[1, t-k+1], s+k-1}] ] ]; a[n_, k_] := a[n, k] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n - j, k+1, j, j, j], {j, 1, n}]]; t[n_, k_] := a[n, k] - If[k == 0, 0, a[n, k-1]]; Table[Table[t[n, k], {k, 0, n-1}], {n, 1, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 11 2013, translated from Maple *)
